name: Animals Pet Go
description:
Animals GO - this simulation game to catch animals. Free your handheld device! Catch animals such as a cat, a dog, an owl, a penguin, dolphin, lizard, pets, hamster, birds, insects, cockroach and many other fantastic animals!
The game will appeal to catch the ball with the help of animals which appear in the background of the camera. Endless balls and try to catch the rare creatures!
Begin the hunt for animals, and now you can not stop until you have collected the entire collection of pocket pets!
For a more realistic effect connected camera. Play in real life as in the virtual world! Discover a world map with the cheerful Pocket pets!
Happy New 2017 Year and Merry Christmas! Thank you for playing with us, leave us your feedback and we will make the game even better for you!
